header.description: Happy Paws is a shelter for dogs that have been abandoned or have suffered some type of abuse. We provide them with medical attention, food and a place while we look for a permanent home for each one of them.

dog.text1: Discover the moving stories of our brave little ones and find your partner
dog.text2: Adopt one of our puppies and change his life forever!

donation.text1: Your donation will provide them with food, medical care and a temporary home
donation.text2: Even the smallest help can make a difference in their lives!

product.text1: Did you know that you can help homeless puppies while shopping for items for your pet?
product.text2: Every purchase you make helps the homeless puppies at our shelter.
